hymn.title: Lord, Thou hast made Thyself to me

layout.singingstanza: Lord, Thou hast made Thy -- self to me A liv -- ing, bright re -- a -- li -- ty, More pre -- sent to faith's vi -- sion keen Than a -- ny earth -- ly ob -- ject seen; More dear, more in -- ti -- mate -- ly nigh Than e'en the clos -- est earth -- ly tie.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, Thou hast made Thyself to me A living, bright reality, More present to faith's vision keen Than any earthly object seen; More dear, more intimately nigh Than e'en the closest earthly tie.
